name: ANGRY NEIGHBORS
description: You play as Mr. Triangle trying to keep everybody off of his property. The problem is that the circle boys keep trying to get on his property,  so Mr.Triangle takes a more violent way to get them to stay off his property. (BTW in the game jam it said if you take part outside of CGD, Please state in your upload. Which I have no idea what that is, so ima say I don't take part inside of CGD)
